title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area 

of Athlone (Roscommon)) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (local electoral area athlone (roscommon)) order 2025

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 26 February 2025.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 26 February 2025.

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Athlone (Roscommon)
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Athlone (Roscommon) 
is prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period commencing on 26 
February 2025 and ending on 31 December 2025. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 February, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [43] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting local electoral area athlone (roscommon) prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 26 february 2025 ending 31 december 2025 given official seal 20 february 2025 james browne minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th february 2025 43 3

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Local Electoral Area of Athlone 
(Roscommon) as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and Development 
(Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period commencing on 
26 February 2025 and ending on 31 December 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [43]
